name: The zero-carbon challenge – delivering the targets
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: EPBD target by 2020 and in response the UK government requires that ‘zero-carbon standards’ are achieved for all new houses by 2016 and for non-domestic buildings by 2019.  This session will explore the regulations and strategies that will be needed if we are to meet these targets.

presentations.name: We must ‘nind the gap’ if we are to reach the targets
presentations.speakers: Rob Pannell, Director, Zero Carbon Hub

presentations.name: How to meet carbon reduction targets for new build housing
presentations.speakers: Tom Lelyveld, Sustainability - Building Engineering, AECOM

presentations.name: A balancing act – achieving 2019 carbon reduction targets in tough economic conditions
presentations.speakers: Adam Mactavish, Director of Sustainability, Cyril Sweett
